TopicTitle: AP and PE's Flickering all over the place. Location - Mun Landing - Orbital Ship not showing up.

Articles.Content: In this shot I'm currently on the Mun landed with a Ship in Orbit for refueling trip home.   I'm still on the Mun when I hit MAP and multiple AP and PE's are jumping all over the screen around the MUN (Too fast for Screen capture).  As you can see my orbital ship is not even showing up.
